name: Parking Cop Simulator
description: Take on the role of a Parking Enforcement Officer and show your knowledge of parking regulations and laws as you hand out fines to parking violators!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
